sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="vnpay-confirm">
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col cols="12" lg="2">
          <v-row>
            <v-chip class="ma-2" label>Mã đơn hàng</v-chip>
          </v-row>
          <v-row>
            <v-chip class="ma-2" label>Tổng tiền</v-chip>
          </v-row>
          <v-row>
            <v-chip class="ma-2" label>Nội dung</v-chip>
          </v-row>
          <v-row>
            <v-chip class="ma-2" label>Trạng thái</v-chip>
          </v-row>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="12" lg="4">
          <v-row>
            <v-chip
              class="ma-2"
              color="cyan"
              label
              text-color="white"
            >{{this.$route.query.vnp_TxnRef}}</v-chip>
          </v-row>
          <v-row>
            <v-chip
              class="ma-2"
              color="cyan"
              label
              text-color="white"
            >{{formatPrice(this.$route.query.vnp_Amount / 100)}}$</v-chip>
          </v-row>
          <v-row>
            <v-chip
              class="ma-2"
              color="cyan"
              label
              text-color="white"
            >{{this.$route.query.vnp_OrderInfo}}</v-chip>
          </v-row>
          <v-row>
            <v-chip class="ma-2" color="cyan" label text-color="white">{{status}}</v-chip>
          </v-row>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "VnPayResponse",
  data() {
    return {
      status: ""
    };
  },
  methods: {
    formatPrice(value) {
      let val = (value / 1).toFixed().replace(".", ",");
      return val.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ".");
    }
  },
  created: function() {
    let vm = this;
    let bookingId = vm.$route.query.vnp_TxnRef;
    const currentUrl = window.location.href;
    let array = currentUrl.split("?");
    vm.$axios
      .get(
        `http://localhost:8080/booking/api/v1/vnpay/confirm/` +
          bookingId +
          "?" +
          array[1]
      )
      .then(response => {
        if (response.data.status == 200) {
          vm.status = "Payment successfully";
        }
      })
      .catch(e => {
        console.log(e);
      });
  }
};
</script>

<style>
</style>
